name: The user is presented with error message for invalid code in Editor for Graph Representations page
description: Given: The user is in a page having an Editor with a Run button to test

steps.name: When  The user enters invalid python code in Editor from sheet "GraphpythonCode" and 3
And  clicks run button on the Graph editor page
Then  The user gets an error message on the Graph editor page
